lesson: If we have two values of the same type. We can do a comparison between them. The comparison will result in a boolean
code:
print "is 5 less than 6"
print 5 < 6
print type(5 < 6)
print "" # a blank line
print "is 5 greater than 6"
print 5 > 6
print type(5 > 6)
print "" # a blank line
print "does 5 equal 6"
print 5 == 6
print type(5 == 6)
